title: Finders Keepers
description: Lost and stranded in the Alaskan wilderness was not how Erin Worthington imagined her dream job and fun adventure to end. Getting the highly-coveted internship with the prestigious Dr. Adam James was a dream come true—a dream that would drastically change her life in a way she had never imagined.Terrified and lost, Erin must find her way back to civilization, with the closest town lying over 100 miles away across one of America’s most untamed wildernesses. Her salvation finds her in the middle of the night, but Erin wonders which is more dangerous—the Alaskan wilderness itself, or the stranger who says he will help her survive it.
author: Dana E. Stoy
